name: Canvas
tagline: Sample Rails application with the canvas draw save and import image(static hard coded for now)
body:
### Welcome to Rails Canvas.
This application demonstrates how you can add the drawing board, to any rails application, and you can record you drawing.

```
$ git clone git@github.com:mitijain123/canvas.git
$ bundle install
$ rails s
```
### Authors and Contributors
Mitesh Jain (@mitijain123)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? contact us at mitijain123@gmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
